name: Code: Realize ~Future Blessings~
description: The love story of a girl once deemed a "monster". The girl who was once called a monster finally discovered love. The joyful days that followed with those 5 gentlemen were what she had been yearning for -- And the future that could be with [him]. A game filled with their After Stories and various other tales as well, all together on one disc to quench your curiosity.
